Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/4/2015, off James Borden (DET)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2015, hitting .647 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 9/23/2015 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2016, hitting .591 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Traded from San Francisco to Philadelphia on 2/1/2017 (Going to SF: LF Donald Lamberth, 3B Asa Kelemen, RF Fred Bondurant. Going to PHI: RF Manuel Cambra)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/7/2017...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis (C) on 5/3/2017...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 4/5/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
